definition[0]: pieces of paper with writing on them that you use in your work, at meetings etc
example[0]: I left some important papers in my briefcase.
definition[1]: documents and letters concerning someone’s private or public life
example[1]: While I was organizing Simon’s papers I came across his diaries.
definition[3]: official documents such as your passport, identity card etc
example[2]: My papers are all in order  (=they are legal and correct).
